name: Virustotal-Telegram
description: A telegram bot which can scan telegram files smaller than 1024MB.

VIRUSTOTAL_API.description: Add your virustotal api.sign up to VirusTotal Community. Once you have a valid VirusTotal Community account you will find your personal API key in your personal settings section. This key is all you need to use the VirusTotal API.

userid.description: Enter the user id to which the bot should reply. (your user id)
